name: Survival Distance
description:
A pandemic is in your way but can that stop you from buying your groceries? No. Your only chance to get them is to TRUST NO ONE.

In Survival Distance your mission is to get your get your groceries as fast as you can and as many times as you can.
But there is a twist, there are people, people can be infected or normal. If in contact with a normal person, nothing happens.
If an Infected person is within the infection radius, you will get infected, losing one of your lives.
If you lose three lives you will die.
